title: Injective's INJ Year-to-Date Gain Rises to 3,000% After Latest Jump
description: Injective [INJ], the native token of its namesake's layer 1 blockchain, surged to a record high of $39.15 on Tuesday to complete a 3,000% move to the upside over the course of 2023.

title: HyperPlay game store launches MetaMask Snaps in wallet overlay
description:
The Web3 game store integrated its wallet with Snaps, allowing for greater multichain compatibility and other features.

PC game launcher HyperPlay integrated its wallet overlay with MetaMask Snaps, allowing players to use custom wallet apps within its games, according to a Dec. 19 announcement.

HyperPlay is a game launcher similar to Steam, Epic Games Store and GoG (formerly Good Old Games) but with the unique feature of having a built-in version of Web3 wallet MetaMask displayed as an overlay. According to the launcher’s developer, this overlay allows blockchain gamers to confirm transactions directly within games instead of navigating to a browser wallet.

MetaMask Snaps is a feature that allows third-party developers to create apps that run within MetaMask. It launched on Sept. 12, but at the time, HyperPlay’s overlay feature did not work with it. The latest announcement confirms that the two features have become fully integrated through a HyperPlay software upgrade.

Read more

title: Marathon gears up for Bitcoin halving, buys two mining sites for $179M
description:
Marathon Digital will fully acquire two operational Bitcoin mining sites from Generate Capital, allowing the firm to double its hash rate over two years.

Marathon Digital will pay $178.6 million for two mining data centers as it looks to increase its capacity ahead of the Bitcoin mining reward halving in 2024.

Marathon announced on Dec. 19 that it will acquire two operational Bitcoin mining sites from Generate Capital, totaling 390 megawatts of capacity. Marathon’s Bitcoin mining portfolio currently consists of 584 megawatts, with 97% of its capacity provided by third-party data centers.

Upon completion of the transaction in early 2024, Marathon will have 910 megawatts of mining capacity, of which 45% will be owned and run by the company. Marathon will still outsource 55% of its mining capacity through third-party hosting agreements.

Read more

title: Crypto's impact is 'tiny': Decentralize with Cointelegraph explores Web Summit 2023
description:
According to tech and crypto CEOs, Crypto had been relegated to the ‘back of the bus’ at the 2023 edition of Web Summit despite impending ETF news.

In the latest episode of Decentralize with Cointelegraph, global reporter Joe Hall takes listeners to Lisbon, the capital of Portugal, for the bustling tech extravaganza, Web Summit. 

As one of the world’s largest tech events, Web Summit unites crypto enthusiasts, tech lovers, and industry insiders to dissect the latest trends, anticipate future developments, and share insights on the ever-evolving tech landscape.

This episode explores that while crypto’s impact was felt during the Web Summit, there was a palpable skepticism about how seriously the Web Summit treats the industry.

Read more

title: Modex and FIFA+ Club Elevate the Fan Experience with Second Exclusive NFT Drop
description: Modex, a holistic Web 3 solution for digital assets, is partnering with FIFA+ Collect Club to launch its second NFT drop, allowing holders to collect benefits and artefacts from the ongoing FIFA Club World Cup 2023 in Saudi Arabia.
